```{r setup}
library(tablecloth)
```

```{r}
data(mtcars)
m1 <- lm(mpg ~ cyl, mtcars) %>% tbl_regression()
m2 <- lm(mpg ~ cyl, mtcars) %>% tbl_regression()

tbl_merge(
  tbls = list(m1, m2)) %>%
  apa_theme()
```
